result.arabic_text: أَفَأَمِنُوٓاْ أَن تَأۡتِيَهُمۡ غَٰشِيَةٞ مِّنۡ عَذَابِ ٱللَّهِ أَوۡ تَأۡتِيَهُمُ ٱلسَّاعَةُ بَغۡتَةٗ وَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡعُرُونَ
result.translation: Sila tasa haala isaan hin beekneen Rabbi irraa haguugduun adabbii Rabbii irraa taate isaanitti dhufuu yookiin Qiyaamaan isaanitti dhufuu of amanuu?
